scripts.say: Huh... it's the Commander... I didn’t expect to bump into you at a place like this...
I am in vacation-mode --- hehehe~ Sigh, it's too much trouble to even say “hello”. I just want to go back and nap...
Talk about timing... I’ve almost run out of all the sodas in the cooler... can you help me top up my supply, Commander?
Pretty please, I know my Commander won't refuse to help me...right?
Then I’ll leave it up to you Commander~
